Package org.texgen.textures

This package contains the core interfaces and abstract class implementations for textures and signals.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ChannelSignal Channel Signal interface to calculate the double output signal based on the input u,v, values.
Texture Texture interface used to calculate the texture color based on the input u,v values
 

Class Summary
AbstractChannelSignal Abstract Channel Signal class that implements some basic methods and the ChannelSignal interface.
AbstractTexture Abstract implementation of the Texture interface.
ChainedChannelSignal Helper Channel Signal class that takes another signal as a constructor parameter and then as part of its implementation, uses the value from that signal to construct a final result value.
 

Enum Summary
ChannelSignal.Channel Channel enum used to define which channel a signal applies to if needed in one of the textures.
 

Package org.texgen.textures Description

This package contains the core interfaces and abstract class implementations for textures and signals.
